reinforcement: Thumbnail directly references the problem stated in the title ('ED meds not working'). The use of pills, a clock, and unbuttoned jeans visually illustrate medication and timing issues with ED medications such as Sildenafil and Tadalafil.
The presence of a person in scrubs reinforces the 'urologist' authority from the title.
Surprised expression amplifies the urgency and concern indicated by 'NOT WORKING?!'.
contrasts_or_mismatches: Thumbnail uses simplified phrasing ('ED MEDS NOT WORKING?!') rather than the scientific/solution-oriented language of the full title.
Thumbnail is much more focused on grabbing attention with a problem statement than suggesting that solutions will be delivered.
